text.en: May this vessel become as vast as the entire billionfold universe!
text.en-trans: marmé nö ni tongsum gyi tongchenpo jikten kham kyi khoryuk dang nyampar gyur chik

text.en: May its wick grow as large as Sumeru, the king of mountains!
text.en-trans: dongbu ni ri gyalpo rirab tsam du gyur chik

text.en: May the oil within become as vast as the great ocean at the edge of the world!
text.en-trans: markhu ni té gyatso tsam du gyur chik

text.en: And may a billion such lamps appear before each and every buddha!
text.en-trans: drang ni sangye reré dündu dungchur reré jungwar gyur chik

text.en: Their light banishing the darkness of ignorance everywhere,
text.en-trans: ö kyi sipé tsemo menché né

text.en: From the very peak of existence down to the lowest hell, may they reveal all the realms of buddhas and bodhisattvas throughout the ten directions!
text.en-trans: narmé pé nyalwa yenché kyi marikpé münpa tamché sal né chok chü sangye dang changchub sempé zhingkham tamché ngönsum du tong zhing salwar gyur chik

text.en: Emaho! This wondrous and amazing light, burning brightly,
text.en-trans: emaho ngotsar mejung nangsal drönmé di

text.en: I offer to the thousand buddhas of this fortunate age,
Gurus, yidam deities, ḍākinīs and dharmapālas,
And the deities of all the maṇḍalas,
In all the infinite realms of the ten directions.
text.en-trans: kyilkhor lhatsok nam la bulwar gyi

text.en: May all beings, with my own parents foremost among them,
text.en-trans: pamé tso jé semchen tamché kyi

text.en: In this and in all lives to come, whatever our place of birth,
text.en-trans: tserab di dang kyené tamché du

text.en: Always see directly the perfect buddhas’ realms,
text.en-trans: dzoksang gyepé zhingkham ngön tong né

text.en: And remain forever inseparable from Amitābha, ‘Lord of Boundless Light’—
text.en-trans: öpakmé gön nyi dang yermé shok

text.en: Grant your blessings so that, through the power of the truth
text.en-trans: könchok sum dang tsa sum lhatsok kyi

text.en: Of the Buddha, Dharma and Saṅgha, and the deities of the Three Roots,
text.en-trans: denpé tu yi mönlam di tab té

text.en: This prayer of aspiration may swiftly be fulfilled!
text.en-trans: nyurdu drubpar jingyi lab tu sol
